mapper.select: select * from campingcar.garage where garage_state > 0 and garage_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') || garage_addr like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') limit #{pageStart},#{perPageNum}
select count(garage_state) from garage where garage_state >0 and garage_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')|| garage_addr like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
select garage_no, garage_name, garage_addr, garage_phone, garage_state, garage_code from garage where garage_state>0 limit #{pageStart},#{perPageNum}
select count(garage_state) from garage where garage_state > 0
mapper.insert: insert into garage(garage_name, garage_addr,garage_phone,garage_state, garage_code,state_modify) values(#{garage_name},#{garage_addr}, #{garage_phone}, #{garage_state},#{garage_code},#{state_modify})
mapper.select: select * from garage where state_modify = 0 limit #{pageStart},#{perPageNum}
select count(state_modify) from garage where state_modify = 0
